review: I installed it and all went very easily.  The directions to pair the remote with the fire stick worked very well.  However I downloaded the  iphone app for the fire stick, to use as a second remote when I wanted to voice search.  So far that app is not working and will not pair with the fire stick.  I like it anyway and Amazon tech support is looking into the problem for me and will let me know if there is a fix for that.  I have never used the Amazon photo cloud that comes with my prime membership.  But we downloaded that app and my husbands ipad pictures uploaded to the Amazon cloud.  They then appeared on the TV screen and anytime we want to watch them there we can.  I also discovered if I left pictures and went to my Amazon music it would start and then play with the pictures.  NIce experience. I think my prime membership is well worth the price because i have so many other benefits besides the free shipping.  It was a no brainer to buy the fire stick when our other media player could not be updated anymore. It does so much more.
author: Amazon Customer
